snippet.title: Phantasy Star IV Trailer 1995
snippet.description:
Phantasy Star IV Trailer 1995

Official Content From Sega Of America

Your first assignment is to protect the towns of Motavia from the Dark Forces who are determined to destroy it. You've trained for your chance to be a hero... now it's time to act.
Platforms: Sega Genesis

Sega Genesis
, RPG,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Phantasy Star IV
